#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
double dp[2510][2510] = {0} ;
 
double get(int i, int j) 
{
	if(i==2*j)
		return j;
	if(dp[i][j] != 0)
		return dp[i][j];
	double known = (double)(j)/(i-j);
	if(known>1)
		known = 1;
	if(j>0)
		dp[i][j]= known*(1+get(i-2,j-1));
	double unknown = 1 - known;
	//printf("here %d %d %f\n",i,j,known);
	if(i>2*j)
	{
		dp[i][j] += (get(i-2,j) +1 )*(unknown/(i-j-1.0));
		if (j>0)
			dp[i][j] += (get(i-2,j) +2)*(unknown*(j)/(i-j-1.0));
		if(i > 2*(j+1))
			dp[i][j] += (get(i,j+2) +1 )*unknown*(1.0-((j+1.0)/(i-j-1.0)));
	}
	return dp[i][j];
}
 
int main()
{
	int nn ,m;
    while(scanf("%d %d",&nn,&m)!=EOF)
	{
		int countries = (nn*m)/2;
		int n  = countries *2+1;
		int i ,j;
		dp[2][1] = dp[2][0] = 1;
		printf("%.4lf\n",get(n-1,0));
    }
    return 0;
}
